insert into codeTracker.meta_method ( uuid, fullname, signature, class_name, file_path, package_name, meta_class_uuid, start_commit, start_commit_date, end_commit, end_commit_date, repo_uuid, branch, content, version ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.fullName}, #{item.signature}, #{item.parent.className}, #{item.filePath}, #{item.packageName}, #{item.parent.uuid}, #{commonInfo.startCommit}, #{commonInfo.startCommitDate}, #{commonInfo.endCommit}, #{commonInfo.endCommitDate}, #{commonInfo.repoUuid}, #{commonInfo.branch}, #{item.content}, #{item.version} )

insert into codeTracker.raw_method ( uuid, fullname, signature, meta_method_uuid, meta_class_uuid, version, commitid, committer, commit_date, commit_message, last_change_commit, change_relation, content, method_begin, method_end, diff, branch, repo_uuid ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.fullName}, #{item.signature}, #{item.rootUuid}, #{item.parent.uuid}, #{item.version}, #{commonInfo.commit}, #{commonInfo.committer}, #{commonInfo.commitDate}, #{commonInfo.commitMessage}, #{commonInfo.parentCommit}, #{item.changeStatus}, #{item.content}, #{item.begin}, #{item.end}, #{item.diff,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=cn.edu.fudan.codetracker.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{commonInfo.branch}, #{commonInfo.repoUuid} )
mapper.select: select version,uuid from codeTracker.meta_method where uuid = (select meta_method_uuid from codeTracker.raw_method where signature = #{signature} and meta_method_uuid in (select uuid from codeTracker.meta_method where file_path = #{filePath} and class_name = #{className} and meta_method.repo_uuid = #{repoUuid} and meta_method.branch = #{branch}) and change_relation != "DELETE" order by commit_date desc limit 1)
